note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Welcome to rea.framework

This is a framework for building rich e-Assessments with Apache Flex. We use this framework for otu.lea (e-diagnostics for adult functional illiterates) [[LINK](http://otulea.uni-bremen.de)] and TeBaDoSLa (Technology Based Domain Specific Learning Assessment) [[LINK](http://www.ascot-vet.net/de/221.php)].
name: rea.framework
tagline: Apache Flex framework for Rich E-Assessment Items
